aqm.title: AQM Device (Air Quality Monitoring)
aqm.subtitle: Industrialization of an IoT air quality monitoring device.
aqm.contextText: As part of a group project (4 members), we worked on the production management of a connected device for the French start-up NOSE. The goal was to transform a prototype into an industrializable product.
aqm.step1: Design and validation of the device prototype.
aqm.step2: Definition of the assembly process and manufacturing steps.
aqm.step3: Complete financial analysis (materials, production, assembly costs).
aqm.step4: Proposed improvements to optimize the production line.
aqm.figcaption1: Technical drawing of an exploded view of the device, created in Fusion 360.
aqm.learningText: This project gave me a global understanding of the IoT product lifecycle, from design to industrial production. I strengthened my skills in production management, financial analysis and teamwork.
